properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 6 at 8:53PM PST until February 8 at 8:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 25 kt with gusts up to 35 kt and
seas 8 to 11 feet at 14 seconds expected.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Pinos to Point Piedras Blancas 10-
60 NM.

* WHEN...From 6 AM to 8 PM PST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 8 PM PST SATURDAY
